NomaiObject: Clue: Supernova generate lots of heat Excavation Site 1 CLARY: Pye, you're safe! Oh, thank goodness, thank goodness.. Everybody! Pye is safe! 2 1 PYE: Oh, Clary! At long last, I am free from this dreadful diving bell! Though it was mostly insulated from the heat, the cramped interior was quite unkind on my cervical spine! 3 2 ROOT: You have our deepest apologies, Pye.. But, with this success, we can now be certain that a protective shell crafted from this ore is capable of withstanding even the might of a supernova! 4 3 PYE: But, Root.. The diving bell was only tested by the heat of this volcanic lava pool, was it not? 5 4 PYE: A supernova radiates immense amounts of heat, enough to melt away the toughest of materials.. How can we be sure that the temperatures within this lava pool will be comparable? 6 5 CLARY: Your concern is not at all surprising, Pye! But fear not: our clan's elders have travelled countless galaxies, and even more knowledge was learned from their sibling clans. 7 6 ROOT: It is they who have given us precise measurements of a supernova's temperatures, equal to that of the lava pool's deepest point. We would never dare to work in theory for such crucial data! 8 7 PYE: I see.. That is an immense relief to hear. 9 8 PYE: But if that is so... There is nothing holding us back from fulfilling our elders' mission now. 10 9 PYE: I must leave at once to share the results of this test with Idaea! I will speak with you later, my friends. 11 10 CLARY: Your eyes are filled with such determination, Pye! You have our deepest gratitude for your bravery today again. LV EX1 5 LV EX2 6 LV EX3 7
